pkgmetadata.longdescription: Semi-Supervised Estimation of Average Treatment Effects // Provides a pipeline for estimating the average treatment effect via semi-supervised learning. Outcome regression is fit with cross-fitting using various machine learning method or user customized function. Doubly robust ATE estimation leverages both labeled and unlabeled data under a semi-supervised missing-data framework. For more details see Hou et al. (2021) doi:10.48550/arxiv.2110.12336. A detailed vignette is included.
